subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Orioles won their first division crown since 1997, using home runs by Steve Pearce and Jimmy Paredes to beat the Blue Jays. The Nationals shut out the scuffling Braves.
snippet: The Orioles won their first division crown since 1997, using home runs by Steve Pearce and Jimmy Paredes to beat the Blue Jays. The Nationals shut out the scuffling Braves.
